kit.leader_skill: INT Type ATK +35% per INT Ki Sphere obtained

super_attack.name: Revenge Death Ball (Extreme)
super_attack.effect: Greatly raises ATK & DEF for 1 turn; Causes supreme damage to enemy; Lowers ATK

passive_skill.name: Blutz Waves of Hatred
passive_skill.effect: (Forever) ATK & DEF 150% up; When HP is 30% or more: Ki +2 and ATK & DEF 100% up; (Once) Medium chance of turning into Giant Ape; When attacking with 12 or more Ki: ATK & DEF 150% up; When there is another "Inhuman Deeds", "Corroded Body and Mind" or "GT Bosses" Category ally attacking in the same turn: Launches an additional Super Attack; Chance of performing a critical hit, damage reduction rate & chance of evading enemy's attack 20% up; When there is a "Pure Saiyans", "Hybrid Saiyans" or "GT Heroes" Category enemy: Launches an additional Super Attack; Chance of performing a critical hit, damage reduction rate & chance of evading enemy's attack 20% up; For every attack performed: (Forever) ATK & DEF 30% up (up to 150%)
